casebody.data:
DINESOL BUILDING PRODUCTS, LTD., Plaintiff-Appellee, v. TAPCO INTERNATIONAL, INC. (formerly known as Tapco Products Company, Inc.) Defendant-Appellant. No. 06-1536. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. March 12, 2007.

Before LOURIE, GAJARSA, and LINN, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
